sys_documentation.hint: Name / value pairs which will be added to the record link URL as parameters. Parameters can be static or dynamic based on field values on the records. Following fields are available for every record: sys_id, table. If you want to use sys_id or table prefix the field name with "record.". If you want to use values from "Link Parameter Fields" prefix the field name with "field.". Usage example: { "param_name": "param value", "param_name": "record.table", "param_name": "field.field_name" }
sys_documentation.label: Link Parameters
sys_documentation.name: x_207729_adv_list_item_definition
